sys_ui_page.html:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null"> <j:set var="jvar_needs" value="${sysparm_needs}"/>
<button onClick='confirm("${jvar_needs}", "Yes")'>Yes</button> <button onClick='confirm("${jvar_needs}", "No")'>No</button> <button onClick='cancel()'>Cancel</button>
</j:jelly>
sys_ui_page.name: bulk_update
